author: The Hans India
title: Indian share market ends in red ahead of key global policy decisions
text:
Live
[Indian share market ends in red ahead of key global policy decisions](/business/indian-share-market-ends-in-red-ahead-of-key-global-policy-decisions-930445)[Kerala temple trusts moves SC challenging restrictions on elephant management in Thrissur Pooram](/news/national/kerala-temple-trusts-moves-sc-challenging-restrictions-on-elephant-management-in-thrissur-pooram-930444)[US: Authorities identify suspect in Wisconsin school shooting](/news/international/us-authorities-identify-suspect-in-wisconsin-school-shooting-930443)[Telangana Government Launches CM Cup to Uncover Rural Sports Talent](/telangana/telangana-government-launches-cm-cup-to-uncover-rural-sports-talent-930442)[For design students:The ADEPT examination will be held in 10 languages on 26th January 2025](/hans/education-careers/for-design-studentsthe-adept-examination-will-be-held-in-10-languages-on-26th-january-2025-930441)[UP: Another long-closed temple reopened in Sambhal after years](/news/national/up-another-long-closed-temple-reopened-in-sambhal-after-years-930440)['She paid no heed to naysayers', says Dharavi girl's mother after Simran Shaikh bags WPL mega-deal](/sports/cricket/she-paid-no-heed-to-naysayers-says-dharavi-girls-mother-after-simran-shaikh-bags-wpl-mega-deal-930439)[94 pc of Indian desk workers feel urgency to master AI: Report](/hans/education-careers/94-pc-of-indian-desk-workers-feel-urgency-to-master-ai-report-930438)[Students create eco-friendly christmas tree with recycled materials](/hans/education-careers/students-create-eco-friendly-christmas-tree-with-recycled-materials-930437)[Assembly Adjourned, To Resume Tomorrow at 10 AM](/telangana/assembly-adjourned-to-resume-tomorrow-at-10-am-930436)
